name: Jamie & Charlie
text: PlateDate was a game-changer for us. We're both passionate about Italian cuisine, and our first date at a cozy trattoria was magical. We've been exploring Italy's regional dishes together ever since, and we owe it all to PlateDate for matching us!

name: Alex & Sam
text: Never thought a shared love for spicy food would lead to a sizzling romance. PlateDate's match led us to the hottest Thai restaurant in town for our first date. Many fiery meals and laughs later, we're still going strong!

name: Taylor & Jordan
text: As vegans, finding someone who shares your lifestyle is key. PlateDate not only matched us based on our vegan diet but found us a vegan café that was the perfect spot for our first date. We've been sharing plant-based recipes and love ever since!

name: Morgan & Casey
text: Being foodies, we loved the idea of PlateDate. We matched and met at a sushi-making class for our first date. It was such a unique and fun experience, learning and laughing together. We’ve become sushi pros and partners in life!

name: Riley & Chris
text: Our love story started over coffee, thanks to PlateDate. We both selected 'cafe' as our preferred date location, and PlateDate found the quaintest spot for us. Many coffee dates later, we're planning our future together, with lots of caffeine, of course!

name: Pat & Dakota
text: Food is the ingredient that binds us together, and PlateDate understood that from the start. Our first date was at a farm-to-table restaurant that suited both our tastes perfectly. PlateDate's attention to detail sparked a connection that's grown into so much more.

name: Jordan & Skyler
text: We both have busy schedules and didn't have time to play the guessing game. PlateDate's efficient matchmaking led us to a wonderful bistro that fit our schedules and taste buds. It's been a beautiful journey of culinary and romantic discovery since that first date!
